Description :
  Back in the mountains of Colorado, the horrors happening in the hospital Mount Massive. The establishment was abandoned long ago, but recently restored under the program "Research and charity" Transnational corporations Murkoff. So far, all in the hospital took place in complete secrecy ...   Acting on a tip from an internal source, independent journalist Miles Apshur enters the hospital. What he finds there - beyond the pale of science and religion, nature and something completely different. Once inside, Miles hopes only for one thing - to shed light on all the horrifying truth hidden in the heart of Mount Massive.
